NVE.tooltip: Number of violating endpoints (all setup scenarios)

r2rWNS.tooltip: reg-to-reg worst negative slack (all setup scenarios)

r2rTNS.tooltip: reg-to-reg total negative slack (all setup scenarios)

r2rNVE.tooltip: reg-to-reg number of violating endpoints (all setup scenarios)

HWNS.tooltip: Hold worst negative slack (all hold scenarios)

HTNS.tooltip: Hold total negative slack (all hold scenarios)

HNVE.tooltip: Hold number of violating endpoints (all hold scenarios)

StdCellArea.tooltip: Sum of the 'Combinational area' and 'Noncombinational area' from report_qor

TotalPwr.tooltip: Total power (leakage + internal + switching, no glitch power) for the critical power scenarios.  By default this is the active leakage or dynamic scenario with the highest total power.  It is printed in the logfile RPT-009 message.

LeakPwr.tooltip: Leakage power for the critical leakage power scenario.  It is printed in the logfile RPT-009 message.

Gated%.tooltip: Percentage of total registers that are gated

Bits/Flop.tooltip: Average number of bits per flop from banking

Overflow%.tooltip: Percentage of GRCs that contain any amount of global routing overflows

CritLtncy.tooltip: Critical clock max latency.  This clock can be specified by 'set_qor_data_options -clock_name -clock_scenario'.  By default, critical clock is determined by finding all clocks within 90% of maximum sink count, filtering for the smallest clock period, then filtering for largest latency.  The 'Clock' summary table shows the name of this clock at each stage.

CritSkew.tooltip: Critical clock max skew.  This clock can be specified by 'set_qor_data_options -clock_name -clock_scenario'.  By default, critical clock is determined by finding all clocks within 90% of maximum sink count, filtering for the smallest clock period, then filtering for largest latency.  The 'Clock' summary table shows the name of this clock at each stage.

TotalRun.tooltip: Cumulative flow runtime -- the sum of StageRun for this and all previous stages/labels

StageRun.tooltip: Total runtime for this stage/label.  StageRun = PreRun + CmdRun + RptRun + PostRun (these components shown in the Performance panel)
